concept.title: Upgrading from version 1.1.0.1 to version 1.2
concept.shortdesc: You can upgrade to version 1.2 only from version 1.1.0.1 by using the firmware upgrade command on the command line.

conbody.p: During the upgrade process on a single appliance, the environment is unavailable until the upgrade operation is complete.
In a high availability (HA) environment, you can upgrade each appliance separately; incoming messaging requests can remain online.
Delay any administration tasks until the environment is fully upgraded and operational.
